tlQuery: SELECT table AS Table_Name, label AS Table_Label FROM tablelabels where table IN (?)  and lang = 'en'
tdQuery: SELECT table AS Table_Name, DESCRIPTION AS Table_Description FROM tablelabels where table IN (?)  and lang = 'en'
clQuery: SELECT table AS Table_Name, column AS Column_Name, label AS Column_Label FROM COLUMNLABELS where table = ? and column IN (?) and lang = 'en'
cdQuery: SELECT table AS Table_Name, column AS Column_Name, DESCRIPTION AS Column_Description FROM COLUMNLABELS where table = ? and column IN (?) and lang = 'en'
